description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing conservatory)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:

PL01: Proposed Ground floor plan , First floor plan and Roof plan; PL02:Proposed Front elevation and Rear elevation;PL03: Proposed Right side elevation and Left side elevation; PL04:Proposed Section A-A; EX01:Existing Ground Floor Plan , First Floor Plan and Roof Plan; EX02:Existing Front elevation and Rear elevation; EX03:Existing Right side elevation and Left side elevation; EX04:Existing Section A-A; PL0S -A4 REV 00: LOCATION AND SITE PLAN
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
